title: sqlite: mdb2_schema error: schema validation error, default value of "opened" is incorrect
body:
from https://github.com/owncloud/news/issues/396:

the rest of owncloud fails to load, merely black text on a blank white background reading as follows:
failed to upgrade "news". exception="failed to get existing database structure for updating (mdb2_schema error: schema validation error, default value of "opened" is incorrect: "(1)" is not of type "boolean")"

written to the log:
{"app":"core","message":"failed to get existing database structure for updating (mdb2_schema error: schema validation error, default value of \"opened\" is incorrect: \"(1)\" is not of type \"boolean\")","level":4,"time":"2013-10-18t19:30:03+00:00"}

my owncloud version is 5.0.12, installed via the repos onto an ubuntu (server) 13.04 instance on ec2.

a fix for this issue, or instructions for migrating my sqlite instance to mysql or postgresql, would be greatly appreciated (i'm assuming that a mere dump from sqlite and an import into mysql wouldn't go smoothly...)
